<br>

**PyPotteryTrace** is an advanced tool designed to digitize archaeological drawings by converting raster images into editable vector graphics (SVG). It uses the **Segment Anything Model 2 (SAM2)** to identify and extract pottery profiles, handles, and decorations with high precision.


## Key Features

*   **üìÇ Project Management**: Organize your work in portable, self-contained project folders.
*   **ü§ñ AI Segmentation**: Uses SAM2 to automatically identify vessel shapes from user prompts.
*   **‚úÇÔ∏è Interactive Tools**: Refine masks using Point, Box, and Manual modes.
*   **‚úèÔ∏è Vector Editor**: Integrated SVG editor to fine-tune curves and control points.
*   **üé® Batch Export**: Export publication-ready SVGs, PNGs, and JPGs with customizable styles.
